The trouble with this response is that g3 means black must move the queen, and white leaps in for black's a rook with NxPc7+.  Well, g3, Q (or Bd7) x Nh3, then 16. NxPc7+.  White trades a knight for a rook and pawn.  Wait, skip all that.  White's queen is still under threat.
